enhancements.title: New Animal Types
enhancements.description: Added exciting new safari animals with unique abilities and special powers. Discover the mysterious cheetah and powerful rhino in this major update!

enhancements.title: Enhanced Boosters
enhancements.description: Improved booster mechanics and added new special combinations for more strategic gameplay. The new 'Safari Storm' booster is a game-changer!

enhancements.title: Visual Improvements
enhancements.description: Enhanced graphics with new particle effects, smoother animations, and improved lighting. The safari world has never looked more beautiful!

enhancements.title: Audio Enhancement
enhancements.description: New ambient sounds, improved animal noises, and dynamic music that changes based on your progress. Immerse yourself in the safari experience!

enhancements.title: Achievement System
enhancements.description: Brand new achievement system with over 50 unique challenges. Track your progress and unlock special rewards as you master the safari!

enhancements.title: Multi-language Support
enhancements.description: Added support for 12 new languages including Spanish, French, German, and Japanese. Play Safari Match in your native language!

diaries.title: New World Record!
diaries.story: Player 'WildPuzzleMaster' achieved an incredible score of 15,420 points on Level 47! This amazing feat was accomplished using a perfect combination of boosters and strategic thinking.

diaries.title: Perfect Combo
diaries.story: Amazing 8-block combination created by 'SafariQueen' resulting in a massive score boost! The combo cleared the entire board and unlocked a secret achievement.

diaries.title: First Time Victory
diaries.story: New player 'JungleExplorer' completed their first 10 levels in record time! Their natural puzzle-solving skills impressed even the most experienced players.

diaries.title: Booster Master
diaries.story: Player 'LightningStrike' used all 5 boosters in a single level to achieve the impossible! This creative strategy opened up new possibilities for future players.

diaries.title: Diamond Achievement
diaries.story: Player 'SafariLegend' unlocked the rare 'Diamond Safari' achievement by completing 100 levels with perfect scores. A true master of the game!

diaries.title: Speed Runner
diaries.story: Player 'FastFinger' completed the entire tutorial in under 2 minutes! Their lightning-fast reflexes and strategic thinking set a new speed record.
